name: GroundWarp
description:
GroundWarp is a game made for The Pygame Community Summer Jam 2022 in under a week along with ThePythonGuy3.

Grab The Device and guide Anastasia through the levels and dimensions... beware of the teeth lurking in the Organic, make sure to not hit your head on the ceiling while jumping on a bumper in Industrial, and try to grab all the strawberries from Forest.

Controls

Use W, A, D to move around,

ESC to pause/unpause,

C to screenshot (it will be saved in screenshots/ directory),

P to toggle debug hitboxes

Made By

Txar
Discord: Txar#7471
https://txar.itch.io

ThePythonGuy3
Discord: ThePythonGuy#3818
https://thepythonguy3.itch.io/

Level Editor

The "MAKE" button in main menu brings you to the level editor, it's not very polished but if you want to mess around in it then you can just replace some in game level (directory rooms/) with your own room.

Thank you!

Good luck and have fun, make sure to post your score in the comments!
Thank you for playing!

<3

Pygame easter egg hint: Answer the menu.

There's a second easter egg, no hints this time, just be curious. ;)
